meanings.definition: Relating to or situated at the zenith.
meanings.sent1: The sun's zenithal position in the sky was perfect for sunbathing.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the zenithal light in the painting beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The zenithal view from the mountaintop took their breath away.
meanings.sent4: Her joy reached a zenithal level when she received the award.
meanings.sent5: The zenithal glow of the full moon illuminated the night sky.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the highest point or culmination.
meanings.sent1: The team's performance reached a zenithal level during the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The climber finally reached the zenithal peak of the mountain after a long journey.
meanings.sent3: The cake's zenithal decoration made it the highlight of the party.
meanings.sent4: His career hit a zenithal moment when he won the prestigious award.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room was at a zenithal point as the countdown began.
